mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memcache_baseline(baseline_name,serverId,uptime, curr_time, total_conn, curr_conn, curr_items, cmd_set, get_hits, get_misses, bytes_read, bytes_written, delete_hits, delete_misses, evictions,limit_maxbytes, bytes, taskId) VALUES( #{baseline_name},#{serverId},#{uptime}, #{curr_time}, #{total_conn}, #{curr_conn}, #{curr_items}, #{cmd_set}, #{get_hits}, #{get_misses}, #{bytes_read}, #{bytes_written}, #{delete_hits}, #{delete_misses}, #{evictions},#{limit_maxbytes},#{bytes},#{taskId})
mapper.select: SELECT id,baseline_name, serverId, uptime,curr_time, total_conn, curr_conn, curr_items, cmd_set, get_hits, get_misses, bytes_read, bytes_written, delete_hits, delete_misses, evictions,limit_maxbytes, bytes, taskId FROM memcache_baseline WHERE serverId = select id from servers where address = #{server} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id,baseline_name, serverId, curr_time, total_conn, curr_conn, curr_items, cmd_set, get_hits, get_misses, bytes_read, bytes_written, delete_hits, delete_misses, evictions,limit_maxbytes, bytes, taskId FROM memcache_baseline ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, baseline_name, serverId,uptime, curr_time, total_conn, curr_conn, curr_items, cmd_set, get_hits, get_misses, bytes_read, bytes_written, delete_hits, delete_misses, evictions,limit_maxbytes, bytes, taskId FROM memcache_baseline WHERE serverId = select id from servers where address = #{server} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1

SELECT id, baseline_name, serverId,uptime, curr_time, total_conn, curr_conn, curr_items, cmd_set, get_hits, get_misses, bytes_read, bytes_written, delete_hits, delete_misses, evictions,limit_maxbytes, bytes, taskId FROM memcache_baseline WHERE curr_time >= #{start} AND curr_time <= #{end} AND serverId = (select id from servers where address = #{address}) ORDER BY curr_time ASC
